adaptive.title: Adaptive Learning
adaptive.description: Our AI analyzes your progress and creates personalized challenges that match your skill level.

progress.title: Track Progress
progress.description: Watch your mastery grow with detailed analytics and achievement tracking.

step2.title: Practice

step3.title: Get Feedback
step3.description: Receive instant AI-powered feedback on your solutions.

step4.title: Master
step4.description: Build lasting mastery as the system adapts to your progress.
